short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Donate to Charity Without Spending Any Money

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Helping others has never been easier! 
Contribute to charity without spending any of your time or money!

The Solalita extension transforms your "new tab" page. Each time you open a tab, you will be greeted with an incredible new tab page filled with custom widgets, pictures, and a couple of banner ads. We collect ad revenue from the page and use it to donate to the cause you are supporting!

Whenever you open a new browser tab you are raising money for charity.
Just by doing your normal everyday internet surfing, you are contributing to building libraries, making clean water accessible and so much more.

♡ Get the chrome extension today and make the world a better place. ♡

Solalita will show a couple of non-intrusive ads to your empty tab, that is it (as you can see on the picture above).
We generate revenue from page views. So every time you open a new browser a tab small sum gets donated to a charity.
 These ads are delivered by our advertising partners. These partners may collect anonymized data about you in order to show you ads you'll be interested in.
